description:
Combining decades of experience in personal injury, our team at The Kryder Law Group, LLC, has recovered millions of dollars for people in Chicago, Illinois, and the surrounding areas. We seek to find the fastest route to compensation while still targeting a maximum award. As trusted legal professionals, the attorneys at our law firm adeptly navigate negotiations as well as courtroom proceedings on behalf of clients.

The extensive personal injury practice at our law firm includes incidents such as the following:

  • Car, truck and other motor vehicle accidents
  • Medical malpractice
  • Slip-and-falls
  • Construction accidents
  • Nursing home neglect
  • Wrongful death

Our main focus is always our client. We address each of our clients' needs with compassion. Starting with the free initial consultation, we listen as people share their stories so we gain a deep understanding of their circumstances. Whether we meet in person or via virtual appointment, we are committed to fostering a safe environment where clients can share their concerns and get answers to their questions.

Our attorneys have earned a number of honors, including an Avvo "Superb" rating; being selected for the American Institute of Personal Injury Attorneys' 10 Best Client Satisfaction Award; and being listed in The National Trial Lawyers: Top 100.

The Kryder Law Group, LLC, serves clients in Lake, Cook, DuPage and Kane counties. Our law firm accepts credit cards.
